thread.title: BRIEF-Moneygram International Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.83

title: BRIEF-Moneygram International Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.83
text: March 16, 2018 / 8:20 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Moneygram International Reports Q4 Loss Per Share $0.83 Reuters Staff March 16 (Reuters) - Moneygram International Inc: * MONEYGRAM INTERNATIONAL REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $0.83 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.25 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q4 REVENUE $408.2 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $404.7 MILLION * MONEYGRAM INTERNATIONAL- QTRLY MONEY TRANSFER REVENUE RESULTS WERE PRIMARILY IMPACTED BY SOFTNESS IN U.S. TO U.S. BUSINESS AND SLOWER GROWTH IN AFRICA * IN QUARTER, MONEYGRAM.COM GREW 23% PRIMARILY FROM NEW CUSTOMER ACQUISITIONS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
